ui::TabBar Class Referenceabstract

Documentation

This class is used for UI navigation using a Tab bar.

ui::TabBar::TabBar ( )

Tab Bar construction

Member Function Documentation

virtual Tab& ui::TabBar::at ( list_attr_size_t  i)
pure virtual

This method access a refernence to the tab at the specified offset. This method must be implemented by a class that inherits ui::TabBar.

Parameters
iThe offset of the tab to access
Returns
A reference to the tab at the specified offset.
void ui::TabBar::draw ( const draw::DrawingAttr &  attr)
virtual

This method draws the object using the specified drawing attributes.

The attributes specify which bitmap to draw on, what size to draw, and where to draw. The dimensions and position are scaled to fit on the bitmap.

Reimplemented from draw::Drawing.

sg_size_t ui::TabBar::h ( ) const
inline

Access the height of the tab bar as a ratio to Drawing::scale()

const draw::DrawingAttr &  attr 
)
virtual

This method is called on the current Element when an event (e.g., Element::ENTER, Element::UPDATE, Element::TOP_PRESS) happens.

Parameters
eventThe event to execute
Returns
For transitions, the new element is returned; otherwise this

Reimplemented from ui::Element.

void ui::TabBar::set_height ( sg_size_t  h)
inline

Set the height of the tab bar where Drawing::scale() height will set the height to fill the entire screen.

Parameters
hHeight of the tab bar as a ratio to Drawing::scale()
